pages.text: Firstly, the essence slot. As shown on the the page to the right-->] This is the slot you insert your "Essence" of whatever type into!
Secondly, the component slot. The component slot is used for- You guessed it.. Putting form components into! It is found right under the "Essence" slot as shown -->
Thirdly, the template slot. Once you put your chosen template into the slot, (Considering you actually have the essence and component), You should now have your form!
